author: franzoni
body:
update of #9970 (closed now), forward port of #9897 

++ SUMMARY
Validation and rate measuremetns on the skim producers were carried out by Alexis @alkaloge based on 7_5_0_preX

++ DETAILS
- skims DEFINITIONS of 75
- fw port of 9897; superseeds 9868 which can be closed
- rationalization of the skim matrix, intended to pass to T0 the PD => "skims to run" correspondence, in light of 2015 PD's , see https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/physics-announcements/3385.html
- collection of skims requirements by DPG/POG/PAGs : https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1OicL4b3jFUXalsk92GM9qLbNNAVklAGb7bf1T5BwZrY/edit#gid=0
- configBuilder modified to preserve output modules set by --eventcontent when SKIM is in the sequence
title: skims: definition, matrix, configBuilder - retry
